game.name: Lone Bird in the Tree
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능
game.shortDescription: “Lone Bird in the Tree” is an ADV with male and female versions of each of the four characters. The story alternates between the “future” of the main character, who is deeply traumatized by the grief of his/her best friend, and the “story leading up to the loss of his/her best friend”.
